review:
Great and good helping Nature. Kindness towards poor patient.
from my experience, I took a old lady aged about 70 years from a village near by Bangalore with a major ortho problem near the hip region. This was attended about 5 years back with a very minimel Charges. Till today this old lady is happy & leaving Health in her village.

Thanks to Dr. Somashekar

Nobody answered why 600/- was taken. Kindly work on it
